column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na enye hɛn edzi no dɛm yi
column4: dɛ aber a enye Midian rokɔko no ammfrɛ hɛn yi? Na wɔkasaa no dzendzenndzen."

column3: Ebɛnadze na afei emi mayɛ a wɔdze to hom dze ho? Ana Efraim n'esikyireamba mpɛpɛwdzi nnye nnsen Abiezer no wenyinamba tsew bi a?"

column2: "Nyankopɔn dze Midian asafohemfo Oreb na Zeeb
column3: ahyɛ hom nsa: na ebɛnadze na emi metum mayɛ a wɔdze to homdze ho? Na ɔsee dɛm no
column4: hɔn bo dwee no."

column3: na otwaa ɔnoara
column4: na mbarimba ahaasa a wɔka no ho no
column5: nna wɔaberɛ naaso wɔda ho ara tsiw."

column3: Meserɛ hom
column4: hom mfa boodoo ntɔwmu bi mbrɛ nkorɔfo a wodzi m'ekyir yi; na wɔaberɛ

column3: Ana woara wo nsa enya esuo Zeba na Zalmunna hɔn nsamu
column4: nna yɛmfa boodoo bi mma wo dɔm yi?"

column3: Oye mbom sɛ EWURADZE nya dze Zeba na Zalmunna hyɛ me nsa a
column4: ɔno medze sar do nsoɛ na ɔnye nhwirom nsoɛ bɛtsetsew hom honam."

column3: na ɔkɛkaa no dɛmara kyerɛɛ hɔn: na Penuelmba no buaa no dɛ mbrɛ Sukɔtmba no buae no ara."

column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Penuelmba no so dɛ
column3: Sɛ mesan meba no asomdwee mu a
column4: mubodwuruw abantsentsen yi."

column3: na hɔn dɔm ka hɔn ho
column4: wɔbɛyɛ mbarimba mpem duenum
column5: boka afamu dɔm no nyinara mu hɔn a wɔkae nyinara nye no: osiandɛ mbarimba mpemɔha eduonu a wɔtwe afona na wɔtotɔree."

column2: "Na Gideon fowee faa hɔn a wɔtsetse asese mu wɔ Noba na Jogbeha boka afamu ɔkwan do
column3: na okokum dɔm no; osiandɛ nna hɔn enyiwa nnyi hɔnho do."

column2: "Na Zeba na Zalmunna guanee; na otsiiw hɔn; na ɔkɛkyeer dɛm Midian ahemfo beenu no
column3: na ɔbɔɔ dɔm no nyinara gui."
Joas babanyin no
column4: sanee fi akono faa Heres afowee bae."

column2: "Na ɔkyeer aberantsɛ bi a ofi Sukɔtmba no mu
column3: na obisaa no: na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ Sukɔt etsitsir
column4: na ne mpanyimfo no maa no

column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hom nhwɛ Zeba na Zalmunna no a hɔn ntsi hom sii me atwetwe dɛ
column5: Ana Zeba na Zalmunna afei wo nsa enya esuo hɔn nsamu
column6: ma ntsi yɛmfa boodoo bi mma wo mbarimba a wɔaberɛ yi no?"

column3: na sar do nsoɛ na nhwirom nsoɛ
column4: na ɔdze kyerɛɛ Sukɔtmba no nyansa."

column3: na okum kurow no mu mbanyin no."
Mbarimba a hom kunkum hɔn wɔ Tabor no hɔn su tsetse dɛn? Na wobuaa dɛ
column4: Wɔtse dɛ mbrɛ etse yi ara; hɔn nyinara hɔn nyimpadua mu wɔtsetse dɛ ɔhen bi ne mba."

column3: Wɔyɛ mo nuanom
column4: me na mba a: na dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column5: sɛ hom maa wɔtsenaa ase a

column3: Soɛr
column4: na ku hɔn. Na aberantsɛ no anntwe n'afona: na osuroi

column3: Ɔwoara soɛr
column4: na tu hyɛ hɛn do ɛ: na dɛ mbrɛ banyin no tse no
column5: dɛmara so na n'ahoɔdzen tse. Na Gideon soɛree
column7: na ɔfaa bosoom afaafa ndwindze a ɔhyehyɛ hɔn efumpɔnkɔ kɔn mu no."

column3: Dzi hɛn do hen
column4: ɔwo
column6: na wo ba ne ba so nyina: osiandɛ ɔwo na agye hɛn efi Midian nsamu."

column3: Minnkedzi hom do hen
column4: nkyii so me ba rinndzi hom do hen; mbom EWURADZE na ondzi hom do hen."

column3: Mobɔhwehwɛ hom hɔ ebisadze bi
column4: dɛ hom mu nyimpa biara mfa n'asadze mu nsowamuadze mbrɛ me. (Na osiandɛ nna Midianfo no yɛ Ismaelfo ntsi

column3: Ɔma a
column4: yɛdze bɛma wo dodow. Na wɔdze tam sɛɛw hɔ
column5: na nyimpa biara kɔtoow n'asadze mu nsowamuadze guu do."

column2: "Na sika nsowamuadze a obisae no n'ano tow sika dwetɛbona apem ahaesuon ɔsor ɔbosoom fa ndwindze
column3: na ndwindze a wɔdze sensɛn
column4: na ɔberdum atar a ɔhyehyɛ Midian ahemfo no
column5: na ɔsor ntweaban a ɔhyehyɛ hɔn efumpɔnkɔ kɔn mu."

column2: "Na Gideon dze yɛɛ asɔfontar saso dɛ ohonyi  (efod)   na ɔdze sii no kurow Ofra mu: na Israel nyinara dzii ekyir wɔ ehuhudze mu wɔ hɔ: na ɔbɛyɛɛ efir dze maa Gideon
column3: na ne fi."

column2: "Na wɔbrɛɛ Midian adze wɔ Israelmba enyim
column3: na wɔamma hɔn tsir do ara bio. Na asaase no do dwee araa mfe eduanan wɔ Gideon ne nda mu."

column2: "Na Joas ne babanyin Jerubaal kɔree kɛtsenaa nankasa ne fie."
"Nna Gideon wɔ mbabanyin eduosuon a wofi no honam mu: osiandɛ ɔwɔ yernom pii."

column3: na ɔno so woo babanyin maa no
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Abimelek."

column3: Joas babanyin no wui wɔ nkɔdaayɛ papaapa mu
column4: na wosiee no wɔ n'egya Joas n'asamandan mu

column3: Gideon wui ara
column4: nna Israelmba no saan bio na wokedzii Baalim ekyir ehuhudze mu
column5: na wɔdze Baal-berit yɛɛ hɔn nyame."

column2: "Na Israelmba no annkaa EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn a oyii hɔn fii hɔn atamfo nyinara nsamu wɔ nkyɛnkyɛn nyina no."
"Nkyii so wɔannkyerɛ adɔyɛ amma Jerubaal (a ɔnoara nye Gideon no) ne fi
column3: dɛ mbrɛ papayɛ a ɔyɛɛ maa Israel no nyinara tse no."
